description: had to go to snap's website to watch the gif and see what commands they use. the command is should-i-watch-this lookup "movie", but that doesn't matter because it doesnt work.

In the simplest command line, gives year, director, actors, link to the trailer and scores from RT, IMDb, Metacritic. 
Works fine after you add API key when running the command for the first time AND you validate your API key on the OMDb website.
you have to get an api key through email, then it works
